description: Shows the metadata for a feature within a feature group.

parameters.name: FeatureGroupName
parameters.description: The name or Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the feature group containing the feature.

nested_items.name: FeatureGroupArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the feature group that contains the feature.

nested_items.name: FeatureGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the feature group that you've specified.

nested_items.name: FeatureName
nested_items.description: The name of the feature that you've specified.

nested_items.name: FeatureType
nested_items.description: The data type of the feature.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp indicating when the feature was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp indicating when the metadata for the feature group was modified. For example, if you add a parameter describing the feature, the timestamp changes to reflect the last time you.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description you added to describe the feature.

nested_items.name: Parameters
nested_items.description: The key-value pairs that you added to describe the feature.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: A key that must contain a value to describe the feature.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value that belongs to a key.
